overview: Hang on to your hats, cowpunchers; the cowpokes of COLT Studio are here! COLT men know how rewarding a good roll in the hay can be at the end of a long day working the north 40, and now you can experience the hottest studs ever to sport a Stetson on this 2-hour long collection. "COLT Cowboy Country" offers up classic linemen like Mike Davis and Ward Austin along with current COLT superstar Franco Corelli in some of the best boots 'n chaps sequences ever to flash across the silver screen! So saddle up boys, the COLT Studio cowboys are a comin' to town!
title: Cowboy Country
